title: Distributed Cryptographic System for Immutable Defensive Publication
raw_concept: A method using distributed version control (Git), automated CI/CD pipelines, and third-party digital object identifier (DOI) repositories (Zenodo) to timestamp and cryptographically verify technical disclosures, thereby invalidating novelty for patent applications in multiple jurisdictions simultaneously.

title: SAT Blacklist Monitor
raw_concept: An automated system that polls the SAT (Tax Authority) 69-B API/List daily, normalizes the data, and runs a cross-reference match against an enterprise's vendor list to flag non-deductible fiscal risks in real-time.
